description: Search, filter, and list articles from the database with various criteria

optional_params.name: keyword
optional_params.description: Search term to match in title or content

optional_params.name: limit
optional_params.description: Maximum number of results to return

optional_params.name: offset
optional_params.description: Number of results to skip (for pagination)

response_format.returned_count: number of articles in this response

error_codes.INVALID_FILTER: I couldn't understand that filter. Try 'draft', 'published', or 'all'.
error_codes.DATABASE_ERROR: I couldn't search articles right now. Please try again.

usage_notes: Default limit is 20 to avoid overwhelming responses
Keyword search checks both title and content fields
Empty keyword returns all articles matching status filter
Always sort by most recent first unless user specifies otherwise
Return full article objects including id, title, excerpt, status, dates
